I got an apple from a pantry.
I only had one hand.
I would not drop the apple.
I was standing in the living room.
The pantry had a door and shelves.
There's a handle on the door.
There's an apple on the shelves.
I walked to the pantry.
I opened the door.
I walked inside the pantry.
I grabbed an apple.
I walked to the living room.
Done.

I opened a car door.
I was standing in front of a car door.
The car door had a handle.
I grabbed the handle from above.
I pulled.
I stepped backwards.
I let go.
Done.

I opened a drawer.
I only had one hand.
I was standing in front of a drawer.
The drawer had a knob.
I put my hand on the knob.
I turned the knob.
I pulled the drawer open.
Done.

I opened a jar.
I only had one hand.
I was standing in front of a counter.
